decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1427/pl/01, 1427/pl/02 and Location Plan. Received 24/07/2014. 1427/pl/03. Received 25/07/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the outbuilding hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the outbuilding hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The building hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than as part of the main dwelling at 7 Church Stretton Road and shall not be occupied as primary residential accommodation or as a separate dwelling or for business use.
description: Erection of a single storey outbuilding in rear garden for use as ancillary living space together with a canopy linking the structure to the main house.
